alert.note: Alert for Henderson; Union (Kentucky) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Paducah (Southern Illinois and Indiana, Southeastern Missouri and Western Kentucky)
info.headline: Flood Warning issued January 27 at 1:38PM EST until February 05 at 1:00AM EST by NWS Paducah
info.description: ...The National Weather Service in Paducah KY has issued a Flood Warning for the following rivers in Illinois...Kentucky...Indiana... Ohio River at Shawneetown, J.T. Myers Dam and Mount Vernon. .Above normal rainfall this month will continue to cause significant rises on the Ohio River. The river at Mount Vernon, J. T. Myers and Shawneetown will rise above flood stage late Tuesday night into Wednesday morning, and will continue to rise through next weekend. Additional information is available at www.weather.gov/pah. && ...FLOOD WARNING IN EFFECT FROM WEDNESDAY MORNING TO MONDAY, FEBRUARY 05... * WHAT...Minor flooding is forecast. * WHERE...Ohio River at Mount Vernon. * WHEN...From Wednesday morning to Monday, February 05. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 6:00 AM CST Saturday, January 27 the stage was estimated to be 26.9 feet. - Bankfull stage is 35.0 feet. - Forecast...The river is expected to rise above flood stage Wednesday morning to a crest of 36.7 feet Friday morning. It will then fall below flood stage Sunday, February 04. - Flood stage is 35.0 feet. &&
